text: to jo shakhs khuda par jhooth bohataan bodhe ya usakee aayaton ko jhuthalae usase badhakar zaalim aur kaun hoga phir to vah log hain jinhen unakee (taqadeer) ka likha hissa (rizak) vagairah milata rahega yahaan tak ki jab hamaare bheje hue (pharishte) unake paas aakar unakee rooh kabz karegen to (unase) poochhegen ki jinhen tum khuda ko chhodakar pukaara karate the ab vah (kahaan hain to vah kuphphaar) javaab degen ki vah sab to hamen chhod kar chal champat hue aur apane khilaaph aap gavaahee degen ki vah beshak kaafir the
